vendor_name: City Edge South Melbourne Apartment Hotel
title: Brand New Studios in Trendy South Melbourne
description:
Lying literally at the city's edge, the City Edge South Melbourne Apartment Hotel couldn’t be more fittingly named, with the best of South Melbourne’s hidden laneways, world-famous coffee and rooftop bars within an easy stroll. This contemporary property invites you to discover one of the city’s oldest suburbs, within walking distance of Albert Park, St. Kilda Road Precinct, the Royal Botanic Gardens, South Melbourne Beach and Crown Casino. Enjoy complimentary car parking and guaranteed 12pm late checkout included in your stay.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
location_description: City Edge South Melbourne Apartment Hotel
